nodes.text: The Animal Instincts were an acrobatic traveling circus troupe devised by Petro and his fellow Jedi Initiates as a means of infiltrating Hondo Ohnaka's pirate outpost on Florrum. By posing as members of Preigo's Traveling World of Wonder, the Jedi Initiates hoped to rescue Padawan Ahsoka Tano from the Ohnaka Gang.
